title: TikTok Ban' & Recent Changes: TikTok Wants Your Feedback! 🎁 (Reward)
description: TikTok is collecting valuable feedback on recent platform changes, user challenges, and any concerns you may have—whether it’s recharging issues, app crashes, or thoughts on scalable rewards. Please fill out our form and share your honest insights. One lucky participant will win 50,000 diamonds!

title: Creator Requirements Update
description:
To maintain your status on Infinitum LIVE Creator Network, all creators must meet the monthly requirements of:

✅ 7 Valid Days (days with eligible streaming activity)
⏳ 15 Hours of LIVE streaming

Creators who do not fulfill these minimum requirements will be removed from the network ❌.

We are looking for dedicated and consistent creators who are committed to growing on the platform 📈. Your effort and engagement are key to maximizing your success and opportunities within the network! 💎✨

If you’re serious about building your presence, increasing your earnings, and thriving on TikTok LIVE, stay consistent and put in the time! Let’s grow together! 🚀🔥

title: [February 2025] Creator Bowl!
description:
We’ve got something exciting coming your way, and we want YOU to be part of it! 🌟

We're kicking off a special 2 week TikTok LIVE campaign where creators like you can team up, compete, and score big rewards! Whether you're a fan of the game or just love the thrill of competition, this is your chance to shine, have fun, and earn amazing rewards.

🏈 When: Week 1 (Feb 7-13) & Week 2 (Feb 14-20)
🏈 Rewards: Top 3 creators* will earn swag bundles - one for yourself and one for your favorite supporter! Top 20 creators* will earn Diamond rewards 💎

🏈  Gameplay & Points:
Week 1: Go LIVE and earn more Creator's Team members
Week 2: Go LIVE and win Matches

1 Match Point = 1 Point
Diamond Received from Creator's Team = Gift Diamond *2 Points
1 Quarterback Frank Gift (500 coins) = 500 Points
1 Touchdown Party Gift (1999 coins) = 3000 Points
1 Field Goal Gift (4088 coins) = 8000 Points

🔗 Participate HERE or go to: https://bit.ly/CreatorBowl! Don’t wait — we need you on our team!

The Creator's Team pillow above will be in the swag bundle and we can’t wait to see you LIVE!

To be eligible, Creator must be a Creator who is directly managed by a creator manager within the TikTok LIVE Creator Program or agency that is part of the TikTok LIVE Creator Networks Program and has been officially onboarded as of February 1, 2025.

title: [February 2025] Go LIVE and Spread the Love This Valentine's Day 💌🌹❤
description:
It's our favorite time of year! Spread the Love on LIVE is back and it's time for you to get involved. Join us for a Valentine's day celebration on LIVE and earn exclusive Valentine's day themed gifts from your community! That's not all... The more gifts you receive and missions you complete, the higher you rank on the leaderboard and have the opportunity to win exciting rewards 🎁💝
Sign up starting Feb 8th 🔗 → https://campaign-va.tiktokv.com/falcon/campaign/fusion_cosmic_runtime/pages/home/index.html?activityId=7467555763665144581&campaign_traffic_id=cptraffic010002sc1000000012095037188&enter_from=live_square_banner&api_env=&lang=en&isRTL=0&short_id=1536632579&__live_platform__=webcast&_pia_=1&from_feed=true&hide_nav_bar=1&hide_status_bar=1&bdhm_bid=tiktok_campaign_component_hybrid

📌 Important Campaign Details:
Dates: February 10th 2025 - February 16th 2025
How to win:
There will be 3 creator leaderboards based off of creator performance in the past 30 days - Cupids 💘 Roses 🌹 and Hearts ❤️. You can find what leaderboard you will be eligible for on the in-app page.

In addition to the overall leaderboard points above, creators can complete multi-level missions throughout the campaign period. Depending on what leaderboard you are on, your multi-level missions could look different. See the in-app page for more details.

An example of what your multi-level missions could look like for extra points on the leaderboard!

Level one

Go LIVE for 30 minutes
Receive 4 Lover's glasses gifts
3k Points

Level two
Have 5 viewers join your creator's team
Receive 2 It's a match gifts
6k points

Level three
Receive gifts from 100 gifters
Receive 1 Cupid gifts
10k points

Rewards:
TikTok LIVE wants to show appreciation to our Creators and offer exclusive TikTok Swag for the top 3 winners of the Cupids 💘 Roses 🌹 and Hearts ❤️ leaderboards! 4-10th place winners will receive diamond rewards 🎉💎

title: LA Based Creators Casting for TikTok LIVE Videos
description:
Company Details:
Directed by TikTok LIVE Creator Network Business Development team.

Project Description:
Seeking LIVE creators to appear in Creator Network acquisition videos for social/web usage. (Note: These videos will be promoting enrolling as a Creator Network/ getting more active as a creator)
Creators must be camera-ready, this will be a fast shoot (approx 2 hour), with script memorization and spoken lines required. There will be a director and on-site production team.
Each video will feature one creator.
Creators must be welcoming, engaging, bubbly, and friendly. Previous Community Guideline infringements will disqualify the creator from participating
Previous acting experience perferred. High quality LIVE required.

Compensation & Contract:
Total Pay: Uncompensated
Additional: You will be signing a photo/video release form for us to own/use the assets for our social media/ websites.

If you are interested please let your manager know before 3pm PST, Friday, February 7th, 5PM PT. Casting results will be communicated by the end-of-day, Monday, February 10.

link https://forms.gle/CV7U3zmwFF5AqhoW7

title: TikTok LIVE Update
description:
We hope you’re doing well. Great news: TikTok is here to stay—so let’s keep that momentum going with your LIVE sessions and content creation!

Important Reminders
Complete Your Hour ⏰
Whenever you go LIVE, be sure to fulfill the full hour. TikTok’s new payout structure rewards consistent streamers with higher earnings—up to 53% instead of the usual 50%.

Meet Monthly Minimums ✅
Don’t forget your 7 valid days and 15 hours each month. Stick to your D.I.P (Daily Incentive Program) chart to earn extra rewards from Infinitum.

Updated Pay Model 💰
This month brings changes to our payout system, so stay on top of your targets to maximize your earnings.

InfiniView App
For additional features, tools, a leaderboard, and global chat (plus daily login rewards!), download our InfiniView app on both iOS and Android:

Open on iOS https://apps.apple.com/us/app/iview-ios/id6739147518
Open on Android https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.InfiniumImageryLLC.InfiniView&hl=en_US

Weekly LIVE Creator Showdown ⚡
Boost your earnings even more by joining our Weekly LIVE Creator Showdown (Scheduled LIVE Matches).

Sign Up Here https://forms.gle/4CPC7Mead2gFrEMR6

We appreciate your commitment and can’t wait to see what you create next. Keep up the fantastic work, and remember—we’re here to support you every step of the way.

Stay inspired,
Infinitum LIVE Creator Network
Creator Outreach Team

To Infinitum & Beyond

title: TikTok Tax Information
description:
**Tax Time Reminder for TikTok Creators!**

Here’s what you need to know about accessing your 1099 tax forms:

**Where to Find Your 1099:**
Your 1099 tax form for 2024 earnings will be available in the TikTok app no later than 1/31/25. You can access it under Profile > Balance.

**What is a 1099?**
A 1099 is a tax form that reports income from non-employment sources, like your TikTok Shop and Creator Fund earnings. If you made $600 or more in 2024, you’ll receive one to file with your taxes.

Make sure to keep an eye out for your 1099 in your account.

title: TikTok Is back online!
description: STATEMENT FROM TIKTOK: In agreement with our service providers, TikTok is in the process of restoring service. We thank President Trump for providing the necessary clarity and assurance to our service providers that they will face no penalties providing TikTok to over 170 million Americans and allowing over 7 million small businesses to thrive.  It’s a strong stand for the First Amendment and against arbitrary censorship. We will work with President Trump on a long-term solution that keeps TikTok in the United States.

title: TikTok To be Banned 8:30 PM EST
description: TikTok To go dark ahead of Jan 19th ban

title: TikTok has released a statement about Jan 19th
description:
TikTok Policy

@TikTokPolicy
Statement on Possible Shutdown

The statements issued today by both the Biden White House and the Department of Justice have failed to provide the necessary clarity and assurance to the service providers that are integral to maintaining TikTok's availability to over 170 million Americans. Unless the Biden Administration immediately provides a definitive statement to satisfy the most critical service providers assuring non-enforcement, unfortunately TikTok will be forced to go dark on January 19.

title: Scotus Upheld the TikTok ban, so now what?
description: Will the app actually go dark? We honestly won't know until Sunday Jan 19th. If it does we have a back up plan! Join Favorited and apply for our agency there! (We are not jumping ship from TikTok)

title: 🚨 Important Announcement - TikTok Ban Updates
description:
ONLY IF THE BAN TAKES PLACE ON JAN 19th 2025 in the USA 1. We would recommend using a VPN and make sure to set it to CANADA to access TikTok and our network until further action is taken. This will allow you to continue using the app. Be sure to share this information with your viewers.

2. Using a VPN bypasses restrictions until the ban is reversed. (TikTok LTD is an American company, albeit owned by ByteDance, a Chinese entity, making a permanent ban unlikely.)

title: December: A Prime Opportunity to Increase Earnings for Infinitum LIVE Creators 💸
description:
During December, U.S. audiences show unique viewing and gifting patterns. While activity briefly dips on Christmas Day, engagement rises before and after the holiday. This creates an ideal window for creators to boost their earnings. Key findings include:
• Steady Creator Participation: Despite the holidays, the number of creators going LIVE remains constant, reflecting a committed creator base.
• Enhanced Generosity: Average Revenue Per Paid User (ARPPU) grows by 5%, as gifters become more generous at year-end.
• Increased Spending: User spending increases by 3% during the pre- and post-Christmas periods.
• Growing Viewership: Viewer numbers rise by 7% outside of the holiday itself, expanding the potential audience.
• Peak ARPPU During Christmas Week: Even though total activity peaks before and after Christmas, ARPPU is highest during the holiday week, allowing creators to earn more from fewer but more valuable gifters.

Advantage for Managed LIVE Creators on our network:
Managed creators excel during this period:
• They attract 8x more viewers per LIVE than non-managed creators, indicating superior content and engagement.
• They achieve a 31% higher watch-to-paid conversion rate, converting more viewers into paying gifters.

By strategically scheduling sessions to match viewer demand, Infinitum LIVE creators can capitalize on these holiday trends. This approach leverages their inherent performance advantages, helping them maximize returns during December’s prime earning season. 🎊❄️

title: Stay calm about the TikTok ban—here's what you need to know 🚨
description:
The ban is not set to take effect until January 19, 2025.
TikTok can still sell and divest from bytedance to stop the ban.
TikTok still has over a month to file an appeal and potentially delay or overturn the decision.
The app will remain available for use; however, starting January 19, 2025, no new downloads or updates will be permitted. (If the ban is not appealed)
With the presidential transition on January 20, 2025, an executive order could potentially reverse the ban. 🔄
